page.title: 09Marston, Social Life
page.content: The small community of Marston Moretaine together with Lower and Upper Shelton have many Clubs which meet in the village hall. An Indoor Bowls Club meets for afternoon sessions and alternate Friday evenings. It has 25 members. Ladies keep fit meets on Monday evenings and recently a self defence class for ladies has started at the village hall.There is also a Marston Wives group,a Royal British Legion Association and Marston Working Men's Club and Bingo Sessions.The parish also haas 2 Cricket teams and 2 Football teams together with the pub games which can be found at the 3 pubs in the area.
